extends play.mvc.Controller
    Name of the class : PersonController Description : Controller to manage an Person Version : 1.0 Date : 03/11/2016

    • Method Detail

      • persons

        public play.mvc.Result persons()
        GET all persons in the database
        Returns:
        The information of all Person in JSON format

      • person

        public play.mvc.Result person(java.lang.Long id)
        GET the person in the database with his ID if it exist
        Parameters:
        id - The id of a Person
        Returns:
        The information of a Person in JSON format
        If the person exist, return 200 Ok
        Else return 404 Not Found

      • personUpdate

        public play.mvc.Result personUpdate(java.lang.Long id)
        UPDATE a person in the database with his ID with the value of the FROM. If a value of FORM is empty, the value is not updated
        Parameters:
        id - The id of a Person
        Returns:
        The information of a Person in JSON format
        If the person doesn't exist in the database, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 200 Ok

      • personCreate

        public play.mvc.Result personCreate()
        CREATE a person in the database with the values of the FORM
        Returns:
        The person is created
        If the person already exist in the database, return 409 Conflict
        Else return 201 Created

      • personDelete

        public play.mvc.Result personDelete(java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE a person in the database with his ID
        Parameters:
        id - The id of a Person
        Returns:
        If the person doesn't exist in the dababase, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 200 Ok

      • login

        public play.mvc.Result login()
        Check if the user exist in the database with his email and password
        Returns:
        If the user doesn't exist, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 200 Ok and set a cookie with the token and another with the id of the Person

      • logout

        public play.mvc.Result logout()
        Log out the person. Delete his cookies and set the value of his token in the database to null
        Returns:
        If the person doesn't exist, return 404 Not Found
        Else return 200 Ok

      • isConnected

        public play.mvc.Result isConnected(int id,
                                   java.lang.String token)
        Check if the user session is valid or not
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the person
        token - The token of the person
        Returns:
        If the user has a valid session, return 200 Ok
        Else return 404 Not Found

      • getAllProductsForSeller

        public play.mvc.Result getAllProductsForSeller(long id)
        Return all products sell by a seller
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the seller
        Returns:
        Erreur 404 Not Found if the seller doesn't exist Else 200 Ok with the lists of the products

      • getAllObjectivesForSU

        public play.mvc.Result getAllObjectivesForSU(long id)
        Return all objectives of a SU
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the SU
        Returns:
        Erreur 404 Not Found if the SU doesn't exist Else 200 Ok with the lists of the objectives

      • getAllSeller

        public play.mvc.Result getAllSeller()
        Retrieve all seller of the database
        Returns:
        All seller in the database, if there are no seller, return 404 NotFound, Else 200 Ok

      • getAllDiaryForUser

        public play.mvc.Result getAllDiaryForUser(long id)
        Return all diaries of user
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user
        Returns:
        Erreur 404 Not Found if the user doesn't exist Else 200 Ok with the lists of the diaries

      • getAllProductInBasket

        public play.mvc.Result getAllProductInBasket(long id)
        Return id product, name, price, quantity and seller name of all products in basket for an user
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user
        Returns:
        404 Not Found if the user doesn't exist Else 200 Ok

      • removeProductInBasket

        public play.mvc.Result removeProductInBasket(java.lang.Long id,
                                             java.lang.Long idLine,
                                             java.lang.Long idBasket)
        Remove the product in the basket of the SU
        Parameters:
        id - of the SU
        idLine - Line of the SU of the basket
        idBasket - of the basket
        Returns:
        404 Not found if the SU doesn't exist 200 Ok if the product has remove from the basket

      • updateProductInBasket

        public play.mvc.Result updateProductInBasket(java.lang.Long id,
                                             java.lang.Long idBasket)
        Update the quantity for a product in the basket
        Parameters:
        id - of the SU
        idBasket - of the basket line
        Returns:
        404 Not found if the SU doesn't exist, 409 Conflict if there is not enough stock for the product And 200 Ok if the quantity has been updated
